articles.title: Damon Hill makes Saudi Arabia GP prediction which will leave Red Bull concerned - The Mirror
articles.description: Former F1 world champion Damon Hill has forecast a tougher time of things for Red Bull at Sunday's Saudi Arabian Grand Prix after the titleholders claimed a one-two finish in Bahrain
articles.content:
As far as title defences go, Red Bull couldn't have hoped for a much more dominant start to 2023 than their one-two finish at the Bahrain Grand Prix.
